data_items.name: Interface Id
data_items.rule: Interface Id

data_items.name: Schema Version
data_items.rule: The Scheme Version against which the message has been constructed | Notes: nnn

data_items.name: Event Code
data_items.rule: Code used to identify the nature of the Event

D0.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

data_items.name: MPAN Core
data_items.rule: A business key used to uniquely identify the metering point that is the subject of the update.

data_items.name: Distributor DIP ID
data_items.rule: The DIP ID of the distributor who is responsible for the distribution network that a metering point is connected to.

data_items.name: GSP Group ID
data_items.rule: Identifies the distinct grid supply point group (physical region of the country) where the metering point is located.

data_items.name: Response Code
data_items.rule: Code used to identify the outcome of the Event Request | Notes: A= Accept R=Reject

data_items.name: Response Message
data_items.rule: Message describing the status/outcome of the previous originating transaction | Notes: Required if [DI-979] = "R"

data_items.name: Incoming Supplier DIP ID
data_items.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a supplier that is responsible for the settlement liabilities.

data_items.name: Incoming Supplier MPID
data_items.rule: Incoming Supplier MPID

data_items.name: Supplier Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date and time from which a supplier came into effect, with regard to their relationship with the metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Outgoing Supplier DIP ID
data_items.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a supplier that is responsible for the settlement liabilities.

data_items.name: Outgoing Supplier MPID
data_items.rule: Outgoing Supplier MPID

data_items.name: Outgoing Supplier Effective To Date
data_items.rule: The last inclusive settlement date after which a Supplier's registration to a metering system ceases to be valid. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Current Metering Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Metering Service Appointed at the point message was created by the Registration Service

data_items.name: Current Metering Service MPID
data_items.rule: Metering Service MPID

data_items.name: Current Data Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Data Service Appointed at the point message was created by the Registration Service

data_items.name: Current Data Service MPID
data_items.rule: Current Data Service MPID

data_items.name: CSS Registration ID
data_items.rule: The CSS identifier associated with a Supplier's Registration

data_items.name: Metering Point Postcode
data_items.rule: The full postcode of the metering point site.

data_items.name: Address Line 1
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address.

data_items.name: Address Line 2
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 3
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 4
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 5
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 6
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 7
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 8
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 9
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Connection Type Indicator
data_items.rule: A code to indicate the type of connection at the metering point. | Notes: W - Whole Current L - LV with CT H - HV with CT E - EHV with CT U - Unmetered

data_items.name: Connection Type Effective FromDate
data_items.rule: The date and time from which the metering point Connection Type is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Energy Direction
data_items.rule: Indicates the direction of energy at a metering point. | Notes: I = Import E = Export

data_items.name: Metered Indicator
data_items.rule: An indicator to show whether the Consumption Component is for a metered supply or unmetered supply. | Notes: False = U - Unmetered, True = M - Metered

data_items.name: DUOS Tariff ID
data_items.rule: Reference to identify the DUoS Tariff assigned to an MPAN

data_items.name: DUOS Tariff ID EffectiveFrom Date
data_items.rule: Date on which DUoS Tariff came into effect | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Energisation Status
data_items.rule: Indicates if the metering point is considered energised. | Notes: D - De-Energised E - Energised

data_items.name: Energisation Status Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The settlement date and time from which an energisation status is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Market Segment Indicator
data_items.rule: An enumeration of Smart/Advanced/Unmetered. | Notes: S = Smart/Traditional A = Advanced U = Unmetered

data_items.name: Market Segment Indicator Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date from which the metering point Market Segment is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter.

data_items.name: Meter Type
data_items.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE | Notes: Values as per ISD

data_items.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
data_items.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

data_items.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
data_items.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID. | Notes: Mandatory for Smart Meters (XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX)

data_items.name: Meter Location
data_items.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site | Notes: Values as Per Data Catalogue

data_items.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
data_items.rule: The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter

data_items.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
data_items.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SSÂ±TZH:TZM

interfaces.name: Notification of Change of Supplier
interfaces.description: Notification of Change of Supplier
interfaces.receiver: Incoming Supplier (SUP), Marketwide Data Service (MDS), LDSO

interfaces.name: Notification to New Supplier of Site Information
interfaces.description: Notification to New Supplier of Site Information

interfaces.name: Notification of Reverse Migration and Deappointment
interfaces.description: Notification of Reverse Migration and Deappointment
interfaces.receiver: Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO), LDSO, MDS, Supplier

interfaces.name: Comms Hub Information (Optional)
interfaces.description: Optional interface to allow passing of Comms Hub information

interfaces.name: Metering Service MTD Updates to Registration
interfaces.description: To notify the Registration Service of Metering related Data Item changes
interfaces.sender: Metering Service Smart (MSS) & Metering Service Advanced (MSA)

interfaces.name: Notification of Metering Service MTD Update to Registration
interfaces.description: Outcome of Metering Service Request to Update Registration
interfaces.receiver: Metering Service (MSS, MSA), Data Service (SDS, ADS), Supplier (SUP), LDSO, EES & MDR

blocks.condition: Repeated for each Installed Meter not impacted by the message

interfaces.name: Change of Energisation Status
interfaces.description: Metering Service to notify Registration Service of changes to energisation status
interfaces.sender: Metering Service Smart (MSS) & Metering Service Advanced (MSA), Unmetered Supplies Operator (UMSO)
interfaces.receiver: Registration Service (REGS), Supplier (SUP) (Failed to action only)

interfaces.name: Notification of Change of Energisation Status Request
interfaces.description: Registration Service to notify the outcome of Change of Energisation Status Requests
interfaces.receiver: Metering Service (MSS, MSA, UMSO), Data Service (SDS, ADS, UMSDS), Supplier (SUP), LDSO, MDS, EES & MDR

interfaces.name: Notification of MPAN Disconnection/Termination
interfaces.description: Notification that an MPAN has been Disconnected by LDSO and/or terminated by CSS
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), LDSO, Market-wide Data Service (MDS), EES

interfaces.name: Notification of Defaulted Consumption
interfaces.description: ECS/MDS to advise of volumes for each Settlement Period which have been Defaulted
interfaces.receiver: Data Services (SDS, ADS, UMSDS), Supplier (SUP), LDSO

interfaces.name: Rejection of Consumption Data/Warning
interfaces.description: Rejection of Data Service provided Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data

interfaces.name: Request for Consumption Replay
interfaces.description: Advanced Data Services to request a Replay of historic Consumption submissions

interfaces.name: Consumption Replay
interfaces.description: DIP to Replay historic Consumption submissions back to the Advanced Data Service

interfaces.name: Notification of LDSO Maintained Data Changes
interfaces.description: Notify participants of changes to Registration Service Data Items maintained by LDSO
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO), MDS, EES & LDSO

interfaces.name: Request to Create/Change MPAN Relationship
interfaces.description: Supplier to request Creation, Addition or Removal of MPAN from a MPAN Relationship

interfaces.name: MPAN Relationship Response
interfaces.description: Registration Service Response to an MPAN Relationship request
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service (ADS, SDS), Metering Service (MSS, MSA), LDSO & EES

interfaces.name: Provide Settlement Period Consumption
interfaces.description: Data Service will provide Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data
interfaces.sender: Data Services - Smart Data Service (SDS) / Advanced Data Service (ADS) / UMSDS
interfaces.receiver: Load Shaping Service (LSS) / Market-wide Data Service (MDS) / Distributor (LDSO) / Supplier (SUP)

interfaces.name: Provide Load Shape Period Data
interfaces.description: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Services (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Public

interfaces.name: Provide Load Shape Totals Data
interfaces.description: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Services (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Public

interfaces.name: Notification of Data Service Influencing Circumstances
interfaces.description: Notification to the Data Service of circumstances which may impact Data Service treatment

interfaces.name: Request to Update Supplier Maintained Data
interfaces.description: Allow Supplier to maintain Registration Service Data Items for which it has ownership

interfaces.name: Notification of Supplier Maintained Data Changes
interfaces.description: Notify participants of changes to Registration Service Data Items maintained by Supplier
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Central Settlements (LSS), LDSO, Metering Service, EES, MDR

interfaces.name: Request to Calculate & Submit Consumption Amendment
interfaces.description: Request by Supplier for the Data Service to Calculate and Submit a Consumption Amendment
interfaces.receiver: Advanced Data Service (ADS) and Smart Data Service (SDS)

interfaces.name: Response to Consumption Amendment Request
interfaces.description: Response from the Data Service to a Supplier Request Calculate and Submit a Consumption Amendment

interfaces.name: Request to Appoint Service Provider
interfaces.description: Initial request from Supplier to Registration Service to Appoint a Service Provider

interfaces.name: Response to Initial Service Provider Appointment Request
interfaces.description: Registration Service Response to Suppliers initial request to Appoint a Service Provider

interfaces.name: Request to Consider Service Provider Appointment
interfaces.description: Registration Service request to a Service Provider to consider Appointment to an MPAN
interfaces.receiver: Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS)/ Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO)

interfaces.name: Service Provider Appointment Response
interfaces.description: Service Providers Response to request for Appointment or Change of Appointment
interfaces.sender: Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS)/ Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO)

interfaces.name: Notification of Service Provider Appointment Status
interfaces.description: Registration Service Notification on Appointment Status
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Incumbent Metering Service, Data Service, Metering Service

interfaces.name: Confirmation of Service Provider Appointment
interfaces.description: Registration Service formal Confirmation of Appointment & provision of MPAN Supporting Data
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service, Metering Service, LDSO, MDS, EES

interfaces.name: Notification of Service Provider De-Appointment
interfaces.description: Notification to a Service Provider that they have been De-Appointed
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service, Metering Service, MDS, LDSO, EES

interfaces.name: Customer Direct Contract Request
interfaces.description: Request from Service Provider to record, delete or amend a Customer Direct Contract
interfaces.sender: Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO)/Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS)

interfaces.name: Customer Direct Contract Response
interfaces.description: The response from Registration Service confirming acceptance or rejection
interfaces.receiver: Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO)/Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS)

interfaces.name: Annual Consumption (AC)
interfaces.description: Send an ECS Calculated Annual Consumption to Registration Service

interfaces.name: Smart / Advanced Readings
interfaces.description: Exchange Smart and Advanced Meter Readings between MHHS Parties
interfaces.receiver: Advanced Data Service (ADS) and Smart Data Service (SDS) / Supplier (SUP)/ LDSO

interfaces.name: Change of Connection Type
interfaces.description: Registration Service to notify DCC of a change in connection type

interfaces.name: Registration Service Notification of Change of Segment
interfaces.description: Registration Notification of a Successful Change in Market Segment

interfaces.name: Registration Service Reminder Notification
interfaces.description: Reminder that some element of Registration Data is inconsistent or invalid
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP)/ Advanced Data Service (ADS) and Smart Data Service (SDS) / Metering Service

interfaces.name: Notification of the Publication of a Downloadable Asset
interfaces.description: URI Listing showing location of Downloadable Resources

interfaces.name: EES Updates
interfaces.description: Provide updates to EES from Registration Service

interfaces.name: MDR Start Request
interfaces.description: Request from SDS that an MDR begins Data Retrieval Activity

interfaces.name: MDR Start Request Response
interfaces.description: Response from MDR to SDS Request to Start Data Retrieval Activity

interfaces.name: MDR Stop Request
interfaces.description: Request from SDS that an MDR Stop Data Retrieval Activity

interfaces.name: MDR Provide Consumption
interfaces.description: MDR Provide Consumption to SDS

interfaces.name: MDR Request / Provide Meter Reading
interfaces.description: MDR Provide Meter Reading(s) to SDS
interfaces.sender: Meter Data Retriever (MDR) or Smart Data Service (SDS)
interfaces.receiver: Smart Data Service (SDS) or Meter Data Retriever (MDR)
